recipesJson.name: Diffy Strawberry
recipesJson.author: photohap
recipesJson.description: A nice smooth strawberry.  Juicy Strawberry and Strawberry Ripe team well together.  The coconut milk is not overpowering, its a faint hint in the background.  The Vanilla Swirl is to enhance the milkiness.  Dragonfruit to balance the strawberries.  The mix sort of reminds me of a strawberry smoothie.  Adjust the sweetness to your desire.  This is a shake and vape.  I am using it on a dead rabbit RDA and its very smooth.  I am using max VG
